sample.ImageLoaderMediator

type
class
extends
primevc.mvc.Mediator<MainEventsMainModelMainViewprimevc.gui.components.Image>
ImageLoaderMediator corresponds to a mediator in the MVC model. A mediator separates event handling for a specific UI element from the element itself. It defines what ImageLoader events should be listened to and what functions react to them.
